thread.title: Expat rates: the best offshore fixed rates on offer
thread.title_full: Expat rates: the best offshore fixed rates on offer

author: Charlotte Beugge
title: Expat rates: the best offshore fixed rates on offer
text: Expat Money Expat rates: the best offshore fixed rates on offer Offshore, the top one year fixed rate is 1.45pc, the best two year rate is 1.35pc and for three years it's 2pc - poor deals in comparison with onshore fixed rates With uncertainty over interest rates, a fixed deal could be an attractive option, but the offers are better onshore than off Photo: Alamy
